Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.payroll

Interface PayrollService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PayrollServiceImpl
public interface PayrollService
This interface defines the contract for managing the Payroll details of Buffett Inc. It provides CRUD operations on Payroll as well as operations for adding and approving timesheets.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5

  • Method Details

    • saveOrUpdatePayroll

      Payroll saveOrUpdatePayroll(Payroll payroll)
      Save or update a Payroll entry.
      Parameters:
      payroll - Payroll object to be saved or updated.
      Returns:
      Saved or updated Payroll object.

    • getPayrollById

      Optional<Payroll> getPayrollById(UUID payrollID)
      Get a Payroll entry by its ID.
      Parameters:
      payrollID - UUID of the Payroll entry.
      Returns:
      Payroll object if found, else Optional.empty.

      Returns:

      Delete a Payroll entry.
      Parameters:
      payrollID - UUID of the Payroll entry to be deleted.

    • getTimesheetsForPayroll

      List<Timesheet> getTimesheetsForPayroll(UUID payrollID)
      Get all Timesheets of a Payroll entry.
      Parameters:
      payrollID - UUID of the Payroll entry.
      Returns:
      List of Timesheets.

    • addTimesheetToPayroll

      Payroll addTimesheetToPayroll(UUID payrollID, Timesheet timesheet)
      Add a Timesheet to a Payroll entry.
      Parameters:
      payrollID - UUID of the Payroll entry.
      timesheet - Timesheet to be added.
      Returns:
      Updated Payroll entry.

    • approveTimesheet

      Payroll approveTimesheet(UUID payrollID, UUID timesheetID)
      Approve a Timesheet of a Payroll entry.
      Parameters:
      payrollID - UUID of the Payroll entry.
      timesheetID - UUID of the Timesheet to be approved.
      Returns:
      Updated Payroll entry.
